name: Longsword
text: Attack: Deal 2 * STR3 damage to an adjacent target.

name: Shield
text: Block Actions you take instead prevent all physical damage.

name: Plate Armor
text: Reduce all physical damage you take by 2.

name: Leather Vest
text: Reduce all physical damage you take by 1.

name: Dagger
text: Minor Attack: Deal DEX3 damage to an adjacent target.

name: Sling
text: Attack: Deal DEX3 damage to a target.

name: Staff
text: Attack: Deal INT3 fire damage to a target.

name: Mace
text: Attack: Deal STR3 piercing damage to an adjacent target.

name: Holy Symbol
text: You gain 'Minor: Heal target ally for 1.

name: Hammer
text: Attack: Deal STR3 damage to an adjacent target.

name: Handaxe
text: Minor Attack: Deal STR3 -1 damage to an adjacent target.

name: Fists of Steel
text: Your unarmed attacks deal 1 extra physical damage and may be used as Minor actions.

name: Boots of Speed
text: You may move as a free action once per turn.

name: Divine Aegis
text: Reduce physical damage you take by STR3 and unholy damage you take by FTH3.

name: God's Fist
text: Either deal 2STR4 physical damage or 2FTH2 holy damage to an adjacent target.
